synopsis: Era of the Gods, year 298, two years before "Yuki Yuna is a Hero." Sumi Washio(6th grade) who was chosen by the Shinjyu, is a hero who protects the world alongside her classmates, Sonoko Nogi and Gin Minowa. It seems like Sonoko and Gin are trouble-makers because they could be idiotic or too energetic. Sumi is excited that she should lead the other two, but...

The hero team, Sumi Washio, Sonoko Nogi, and Gin Minowa, hasn't been able to unify because they haven't had much time to prepare. So, they decided to choose a leader and strengthen their unity by doing a training camp. Sumi saw herself as the leader, but the teacher, Ms. Aki appointed Sonoko as the leader...

The three girls, Sumi Washio, Sonoko Nogi, and Gin Minowa, who now has stronger unity, are working hard to fulfill their roles as heroes. Itâ€TMs part of their job to rest as well. Three of them started to fully enjoy their momentary break.

Sumi Washio, Sonoko Nogi, and Gin Minowa are going to their elementary school's class trip. The three of them are put in a crisis because of the Vertex's advanced action whom appeared as if to shatter their fun everyday life.

The Hero's system advances to prepare for the battle with the escalating enemy. However, that was too brutal for the girls in 6th grade to have to bear. Nevertheless, the girls work hard to fulfill their roles.
Finally, the climactic battle has begun. The heroes are fulfilling their roles with full of new powers. The flowers bloomed beautifully. What kind of destiny would await them in the future...
